page.title: 05Ryland Nurseries
page.content: This is the second of the two nurseries in the block.Thes nurseries are owned by Mr.F. Rowe and were established by Mr. Rowe's father fifty_eight years ago.The greenhouses in these nurseries are made out of aluminium and glass and they are heated by oil and gas heaters.The area under glass is about 19327 square metres.There are twenty seven people employed full time and more than twenty part time. These nurseries specialise in growing Chrysanthemums. In an average year they take about 15,000,000 cuttings and a milliom and a quarter flowers. These flowers are sold a third to S.Wales,a third to London and a third to local shops in Somerset and Devon. There are also some overseas customers.
